title: Research on 15 pc ethanol blending in diesel in advanced stages: Nitin Gadkari
description: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari announces advanced research on blending 15% ethanol in diesel and sets a goal to achieve 20% ethanol blending in petrol by 2025. Efforts in fast-tracking ethanol infrastructure, flex-engine cars, and bio-CNG from waste are discussed to reduce India's fossil fuel dependency.
